result.arabic_text: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقَٰتِ وَٱلۡكُفَّارَ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ هِيَ حَسۡبُهُمۡۚ وَلَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّقِيمٞ
result.translation: 68.Yalli lab munaafiqhiin kee say munaafiqhiiniiy, koros Jahannam Giráh xagnise usun tet addal waarak, is digaaláh xiqqi ken hayta, Yalli isi racmatak ken yeyxeereeh umman aggiriqqe wayta digaalá Ion Qhiyaamah ayró.
